thread.title: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece
thread.title_full: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece

title: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece
text: > South Carolina Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece FILE - In this Sept. 18, 2015, file photo, Carly Fiorina speaks to supporters at the Take Back America Presidential Forum in Greenville, S.C. Fiorina has spent the last two weeks doubling down on her erroneous descriptions of videos secretly recorded by anti-abortion activists, and she shows no sign she'll back off her misrepresentations as she makes her strident opposition to Planned Parenthood a centerpiece of her 2016 campaign. (AP Photo/Richard Shiro, File)
